```{r, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, results='hide', purl=FALSE}
source("functions.R")
yamls=yaml_dir()
```

Below are a set of tasks that we will work in class (either alone or in small groups).


```{r reading,results='asis',echo=F}
for(i in 1:length(yamls)){
  cat("\n ___ \n") 
  cat(paste("# [",yamls[[i]]$title,"](",yamls[[i]]$url,") \n"))
  cat(paste(" ",yamls[[i]]$date,"  \n \n ",sep=""))
  cat(paste(" ",yamls[[i]]$subtitle,"  \n \n ",sep=""))
  cat("\n## Readings \n")
  md_bullet(yamls[[i]]$reading)
  cat("\n## Tasks \n")
  md_bullet(yamls[[i]]$tasks)
}
```
